subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Shielded RVG

full_text:

Frank, it sounds like its working really good!  I have to ask if in your opinion does the random work better the the linear?  Or do you think that other things factor in (like the reception at different times of the day) and its just luck when recording?
   
  Juli
   
  

Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
           From the shielded RVG--random mode. Still some noise, but that's pretty normal for AM anyway. It's also direct mode, no echo box/sound chamber. 
 
 Frank-S
